AI Description: Qt is a cross-platform C++ framework for application development. It provides a comprehensive set of libraries and tools for building graphical user interfaces, as well as for developing applications with network support, database integration, and more.
Core Features: Cross-platform development, graphical user interface development, network programming, database integration, multithreading support, internationalization, drag-and-drop support, rich text processing, 2D and 3D graphics, multimedia support.
General Tags: C++ Framework, Application Development, Cross-Platform, Graphical User Interface, Network Programming, Database Integration
